botsuggestion.ok:
✅ Suggestion sent to support server.
*Any abuse of this or any other command will be penalized.*

bugreport.correcto:
**Your error has been reported correctly.**
It will be reviewed so please be patient.
 *For further assistance or help you can go to the support server or write to DM.*
bugreport.error: There was a problem sending the message, you can send me a private message as an alternative.

donate.title: Supports
donate.desc:
**Vote!** Support leaving your vote in [top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/517786947171909643 "Top.gg") remember that you can vote every 12 hours.
**Direct donations.** You can donate to our [PayPal](https://www.paypal.me/czemtb) or you will have to contact us on the support server.
**Promoting the bot.** There is to be known everywhere.
**Making ...** guides, videos, writing texts, etc. on how to use the bot. StarLight needs everyone's help.
**Writing Code.** If you know programming, you may want to share code to continue implementing new things.

help.descripcion:
Hello, I'm {client_name} and I come to help. This is my list of commands you can use.

Ping: `{ping}` ms
Total categories: `{categorias}`
 Total commands: `{commands}`

masInfo.title: More information?
masInfo.desc: Use: `{prefix} <command name> help` or `{prefix}help <command name>` to get your individual command information and expected parameters.

links.title: Useful links
links.desc: [Invite me]({invite} "Invite me to your server ") | [Support Server](https://discord.gg/MZN8Yf6 "StarArmy Support") | [Support with your Vote](https://top.gg/bot/517786947171909643 "Vote on Top.gg every 12 hours.")

help.noPrivate: ❌ | It seems you have deactivated private messages.
help.noUso: You do not have to add parameters

invite.title: My invitation | {client_name}
invite.descripcion: This beautiful bot can help you in the economy of your server as professional as possible, allowing you to configure many aspects of it
invite.soporte: [Login to the Server](https://discord.gg/MZN8Yf6 'StarArmy') To get help and be aware of all the information always.
invite.web: For more information about the bot as its commands go to the [Official Site](https://starbot-oficial.herokuapp.com/ 'StarBot Discord - Start')
invite.apoyo: Support bot growth by donating what you can through [PayPal](https://www.paypal.me/czemtb 'CZEMTB')

release.title: News from
release.descripcion:
**__New__**
- SetLanguage: Added Spanish Spain `es-ES` and a minimal translation from Portuguese Brazil `pt-BR` *Categories: Core - 100%, Config - 3.2%* Still to be finished and improved.

**__Changes__**
- FlipCoin: Fixed the name of `flicoin` to` flipcoin` and added as nickname `caracruz`.

**__Fixes__**
- CreateItem: Fixed a problem that caused the command not to be executed.
- Dice: Fixed embed message getting out despite cooldown.
- FlipCoin: Fixed embed message getting out despite cooldown.
- Roulette : Fixed an issue that caused the command not to run.
release.footer: These are the changes of the version {version} any problem you can enter the support server. | Developed by {dev}.

vote.title: List of Bots where you can vote
vote.desc: You can vote every 12 hours, with a double voting weekend at [Top.gg](https://discordbots.org/bot/696723299459268728/vote)
